description: Comprehensive toolkit for entrepreneurs at every stage - from ideation to scaling your startup.

tools.name: Notion
tools.description: All-in-one workspace for notes, docs, wikis, and project management with powerful database features.
tools.usageDescription: Central hub for startup documentation, planning, and team collaboration.

tools.name: Stripe
tools.description: Complete payments platform with APIs for online businesses to accept and manage payments.
tools.usageDescription: Industry-standard payment processing with developer-friendly integration.

tools.name: Mailchimp
tools.description: Marketing automation platform for email marketing, audience management, and campaign analytics.
tools.usageDescription: Build and nurture customer relationships through targeted email campaigns.

tools.name: Canva
tools.description: Graphic design platform with templates and tools for creating professional visual content.
tools.usageDescription: Create professional marketing materials and brand assets without design expertise.

tools.name: Typeform
tools.description: Interactive form builder for surveys, quizzes, and data collection with engaging user experience.
tools.usageDescription: Gather customer feedback and validate ideas through engaging interactive forms.

tools.name: Slack
tools.description: Business communication platform with channels, direct messaging, and extensive app integrations.
tools.usageDescription: Central communication hub for distributed teams and project coordination.

tools.name: Airtable
tools.description: Cloud collaboration service that combines the simplicity of a spreadsheet with database functionality.
tools.usageDescription: Organize and track everything from customer data to product roadmaps.

tools.name: Zapier
tools.description: Automation platform that connects apps and automates workflows without coding.
tools.usageDescription: Automate repetitive tasks and connect different tools in your startup stack.
